Articles.Content: Does anybody know where I can download old versions like 0.18.4? I have steam which means I could only revert to 0.23.0 Honestly I just miss the old space center and want a way to play with it.
You could download the demo, but that probably doesn't count...
I wish SQUAD would find a way to make these older versions available on steam, is it possible to get the old versions off the KSP Store?

If you haven't saved old versions, there is currently no place to download them for archival purposes. The closest one out there is the Demo which is a crippled 0.18 that limits you to three flights at once. You can, however, transfer craft files from it to newer versions. I did so with my Mun landers removing the extra SAS and adding solar panels before flying it to Mun.

I recall someone had a thread somewhere in the mists that had an archive of all the old "free" versions of the game (0.8 - 0.13.3), but I seem to have misplaced the link for it. As for the rest, if you didn't save archives of them while they were already available, then they're probably lost.
Does this work? It's from a Google search, and I didn't test the links, just letting you know http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24858-Old-versions-of-KSP-(some-versions-still-wanted!)
I think SQUAD is planning for a collectors edition thing with all the versions, but I don't think we're getting that until KSP 1.0 or later.
I still have the ye-olde 13.3 somewhere in the depths of my computer I think
